verses.verse: Then the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H4427>made<s%> <S%H274>Ahaziah,<s%> his <S%H9512>youngest<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> in his <S%H8478>place,<s%> for the <S%H1416>band<s%> of men who <S%H935>came<s%> with the <S%H6163>Arabs<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> had <S%H2026>slain<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7223>older<s%> [sons.] So <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3088>Jehoram<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> began to <S%H4427>reign.<s%>

<S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> [was] twenty-two <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king,<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> And his mother's <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H6271>Athaliah,<s%> the <S%H1323>granddaughter<s%> of <S%H6018>Omri.<s%>

He <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> in the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> for his <S%H517>mother<s%> was his <S%H3289>counselor<s%> to <S%H7561>do<s%> <S%H7561>wickedly.<s%>

He <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> according to their <S%H6098>counsel,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> with <S%H3088>Jehoram<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H4421>wage<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H2371>Hazael<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Aram<s%> at Ramoth-gilead. But the <S%H761>Arameans<s%> <S%H5221>wounded<s%> <S%H3141>Joram.<s%>

So he <S%H7725>returned<s%> to be <S%H7495>healed<s%> in <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%> of the <S%H5221>wounds<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they had <S%H5221>inflicted<s%> on him at <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> when he <S%H3898>fought<s%> <S%H854>against<s%> <S%H2371>Hazael<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Aram.<s%> And <S%H274>Ahaziah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3088>Jehoram<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3088>Jehoram<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab<s%> in <S%H3157>Jezreel,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he was <S%H2470>sick.<s%>

Now the <S%H8395>destruction<s%> of <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> was from <S%H430>God,<s%> in that he <S%H935>went<s%> to <S%H3141>Joram.<s%> For when he <S%H935>came,<s%> he <S%H3318>went<s%> out with <S%H3088>Jehoram<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5250>Nimshi,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H4886>anointed<s%> to <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> was <S%H8199>executing<s%> <S%H8199>judgment<s%> on the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> he <S%H4672>found<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%>'s <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H8334>ministering<s%> to Ahaziah, and <S%H2026>slew<s%> them.

He also <S%H1245>sought<s%> <S%H274>Ahaziah,<s%> and they <S%H3920>caught<s%> him while he was <S%H2244>hiding<s%> in <S%H8111>Samaria;<s%> they <S%H935>brought<s%> him to <S%H3058>Jehu,<s%> <S%H4191>put<s%> him to <S%H4191>death,<s%> and <S%H6912>buried<s%> him. For they <S%H559>said,<s%> "He is the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1875>sought<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3824>heart.<s%>" So <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> to <S%H6113>retain<s%> the <S%H3581>power<s%> of the <S%H4467>kingdom.<s%>

Now when <S%H6271>Athaliah<s%> the <S%H517>mother<s%> of <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that her <S%H1121>son<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> she <S%H6965>rose<s%> and destroyed <S%H6>all<s%> the <S%H3605>royal<s%> <S%H4467>offspring<s%> of the <S%H2233>house<s%> of <S%H1004>Judah.<s%>

But <S%H3090>Jehoshabeath<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3060>Joash<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H274>Ahaziah,<s%> and <S%H1589>stole<s%> him from <S%H8432>among<s%> the king's <S%H1121>sons<s%> who were being <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death,<s%> and <S%H5414>placed<s%> him and his <S%H3243>nurse<s%> in the <S%H2315>bedroom.<s%> <S%H4296><s%> So <S%H3090>Jehoshabeath,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of King <S%H3088>Jehoram,<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> (for she was the <S%H269>sister<s%> of <S%H274>Ahaziah<s%>), <S%H5641>hid<s%> him from <S%H6271>Athaliah<s%> so that she would not <S%H4191>put<s%> him to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

And he was <S%H2244>hidden<s%> with them in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> while <S%H6271>Athaliah<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>
